voice_instruct: A hollow, broken man's voice speaking with the flat affect of someone who has been forced to murder thousands and believes he deserves damnation, quiet intensity erupting into anguished screams, a monk turned weapon

tracks.title: Truthless
tracks.prompt: dark industrial ambient, haunted male whisper vocals, metallic drones, mechanical percussion, Nine Inch Nails meets Lustmord, C sharp minor, 66 BPM, ritual damnation, cold stone corridors
tracks.lyrics:
[verse 1]
truthless, they named me truthless in the stone shamans' hall
I told them the Voidbringers were returning, I told them all
the Radiants would come again, the Knights would walk the storm
and for speaking truth they gave me a title worse than scorn

the Oathstone passed from hand to hand, each owner held my soul
a truthless must obey the stone, that is the Shin's control
I cannot refuse an order, I cannot choose to die
I am the weapon and the wielder is whoever holds the tie

[chorus]
truthless, I am truthless, I walk in white
the Assassin in White who kills by another's right
every death is on my hands and every death is theirs
and I am caught between the sin and the stone's affairs

[verse 2]
the shamans said my claims were lies, the Radiants were dead
the powers I described were myths, the visions in my head
were madness or were blasphemy, either way condemned
and so they cast me out with a stone that never ends

but I was right, I was right, the Radiants have returned
Kaladin Stormblessed holds the wind, the truth I spoke has burned
through every lie the shamans told, through every year of chains
and still I am truthless, still I carry all the stains

[bridge]
in Shinovar the stone is sacred, the sword is sin
they grow their food in soil, they do not let the storms in
and a man who speaks of Radiants is a man who breaks the wall
between the quiet fields and the screaming of the squall

[chorus]
truthless, I am truthless, I walk in white
the Assassin in White who kills by another's right
every death is on my hands and every death is theirs
and I am caught between the sin and the stone's affairs

tracks.title: Gavilar's Balcony
tracks.prompt: tense dark wave, haunted male vocals, staccato synths, heartbeat bass, Depeche Mode meets Gary Numan, Eb minor, 72 BPM, assassination precision, silk and blood
tracks.lyrics:
[verse 1]
the feast of Gavilar's treaty, the night the world would turn
I walked the palace walls in white, Stormlight beginning to burn
Lashing myself to the ceiling, to the walls, to the sky
the guards could not touch me, they watched their arrows fly

the Parshendi hired me, an odd choice, a Shin with white
but my Oathstone holder said go, and so I went that night
Gavilar Kholin, king of Alethkar, stood on the balcony alone
and I descended from the darkness like a judgement carved in stone

[chorus]
brother, tell Dalinar, he must find the most important words a man can say
that is what the king whispered as the light drained away
I killed the king of Alethkar and I wept as I flew
because the truthless does not choose, the truthless must walk through

[verse 2]
he fought well for a man surprised, Shardplate cracking under my hand
but I held the Honorblade, Jezrien's own, and the king could not stand
against a man who flies, who Lashes stone to sky
I drove him to the balcony's edge and I looked him in the eye

he held a dark sphere, a sphere that should not exist
black light, Voidlight, power in his dying fist
and he whispered those words, those words that haunt my sleep
brother, find the most important words, and then the fall was deep

[bridge]
I left the Honorblade on the balcony beside his corpse
a tradition, a declaration, the Shin's remorse
and I walked into the night carrying a new list
of kings and highprinces whose deaths would fill my wrist

[chorus]
brother, tell Dalinar, he must find the most important words a man can say
that is what the king whispered as the light drained away
I killed the king of Alethkar and I wept as I flew
because the truthless does not choose, the truthless must walk through

tracks.title: The List
tracks.prompt: relentless industrial, haunted male vocals, machine-gun percussion, distorted bass sequences, Ministry meets Skinny Puppy, A minor, 78 BPM, mechanical murder, counting bodies
tracks.lyrics:
[verse 1]
king Hanavanar of Jah Keved, killed in his own throne room
his guards in pieces on the floor, Stormlight cutting through the gloom
I walked the walls, I walked the ceiling, gravity was mine to bend
and every soldier sent against me met the same mechanical end

three Shardbearers came at once, their Blades could not connect
I Lashed them to the sky and let the fall collect
their Plate shattered on the flagstones, the king watched from his seat
and I whispered I am sorry as I made the list complete

[chorus]
the list grows longer, name by name by name
king after king after highprince, and the sin is always the same
I am the weapon, I did not choose the hand
but the blood is on my skin and I understand

[verse 2]
six heads of state in two years, the world learned to fear the white
a ghost who walked through armies like a candle through the night
Taravangian, the old king, he held my Oathstone last
he whispered names and I delivered, present tense from future past

his Diagram, his master plan, written in one day of brilliance
a dying man's equation for the world's survival, resilience
and I was the variable that balanced every line
a truthless with a Blade that cuts through space and time

[bridge]
each name I crossed from the list I carved into my arm
scratched in the skin with a stolen nail, each mark a harm
because the stone commands but the hands remember
and every king I killed burns like a separate ember

[chorus]
the list grows longer, name by name by name
king after king after highprince, and the sin is always the same
I am the weapon, I did not choose the hand
but the blood is on my skin and I understand

tracks.title: I Am Not The Monster
tracks.prompt: claustrophobic darkwave, haunted male vocals, oppressive synth layers, industrial heartbeat, Bauhaus meets Nine Inch Nails, F minor, 70 BPM, dissociation and denial, echoing stone
tracks.lyrics:
[verse 1]
I repeat it like a prayer, like a sutra for the damned
I am not the monster, I am not the killing hand
the stone commands, the truthless obeys, the system is the sin
I am the tool, I am the edge, not the will that drives it in

but at night I see their faces, every guard I cut to ground
every servant caught in crossfire, every innocent I found
standing in the wrong hallway at the wrong moment in time
and I tell myself the stone is the reason, and the reason is not mine

[chorus]
I am not the monster, I am not the monster
I whisper it while walking through the blood
I am not the monster, I am not the monster
but the monster wears my face beneath the hood

[verse 2]
the afterimage follows me, the screaming in the air
the souls of those I killed collecting, hovering, they stare
I see them in the corners, in the shadows of the hall
not real, the shamans say, not real, the madness, that is all

but what if they are real, what if the dead can truly see
what if every soul I sent away is watching me
and what if the damnation that the Stone Shamans declared
is not a future punishment but the present that I wear

[bridge]
Nale found me, Herald of Justice, Nin-son-God
he said the law will cleanse you, boy, the law will spare the rod
but the law he serves is broken and the justice he dispenses
is another kind of stone that commands and takes no senses

[chorus]
I am not the monster, I am not the monster
I whisper it while walking through the blood
I am not the monster, I am not the monster
but the monster wears my face beneath the hood

tracks.title: Nightblood
tracks.prompt: aggressive industrial metal, haunted male vocals with distorted secondary voice, crushing bass drops, chaotic percussion, Godflesh meets Author and Punisher, D minor, 80 BPM, sentient weapon's hunger, black smoke
tracks.lyrics:
[verse 1]
the sword speaks and its voice is wrong, too cheerful for the dark
would you like to destroy some evil today, it says, like a question mark
Nightblood, the black sword, Awakened steel from another world
a weapon so dangerous even Vasher kept it furled

Nale gave it to me as a gift, a leash, a test
a Shardblade that drinks Investiture and never lets you rest
black smoke pouring from the sheath, the metal singing, hungry, fed
by the Stormlight in my veins, by the living and the dead

[chorus]
destroy, destroy, the sword sings in my skull
destroy the evil, fill me up, I am never full
Nightblood cannot tell the difference between wicked and afraid
and I carry it because I am the only one who is not swayed

[verse 2]
I drew the blade against the Thunderclast, the stone monster in the bay
the creature died in seconds, Nightblood ate its Investiture away
black smoke consumed the battlefield, the soldiers ran in fear
not from the enemy but from the weapon I held here

the sword was made to end all evil, a child's wish in metal form
but a tool that cannot define evil is the center of the storm
and I am the man who carries it because my guilt is so complete
that Nightblood's hunger and my self-hatred make a kind of balanced sheet

[bridge]
would you like to destroy some evil, it asks me every dawn
and every dawn I wonder if the evil it means is the one I have drawn
from within, the truthless, the assassin, the Shin boy lost at sea
maybe the evil Nightblood senses is the thing inside of me

[chorus]
destroy, destroy, the sword sings in my skull
destroy the evil, fill me up, I am never full
Nightblood cannot tell the difference between wicked and afraid
and I carry it because I am the only one who is not swayed

tracks.title: Skybreaker
tracks.prompt: martial darkwave, haunted male vocals, regimented percussion, law-like synth patterns, Front 242 meets Covenant, B minor, 76 BPM, justice without mercy, geometric order
tracks.lyrics:
[verse 1]
Nale recruited me into the Skybreakers, the order of the law
he said a man who kills without a code is just a maw
but a man who kills within the law is justice given form
and I needed that structure like a ship needs a storm

the Third Ideal, I swear to follow the law of the land
but whose law, which land, when every nation has a different hand
the Skybreakers split, half followed Nale to Odium's side
and I stood in the middle wondering where the justice had died

[chorus]
the law is a blade that cuts both ways
the law is a light that can blind on bright days
I followed the law to escape my sin
but the law without conscience is just the stone again

[verse 2]
I swore the Fourth Ideal to Dalinar, to the man not the crown
I said I will cleanse the Shin of the false leaders who brought me down
the stone shamans who named me truthless, who sent me out to kill
who held the Honorblades in secret, bending the truth to their will

for the first time the oath was mine, not the stone's, not the law's
for the first time I chose the target, I chose the cause
and the justice I sought was not revenge, though it tasted the same
it was the reckoning of a man who finally found his name

[bridge]
the Skybreakers teach that passion corrupts the code
that a man must be the instrument, not the overload
but I have learned that a law without a heart
is just another oathstone, another stone apart

[chorus]
the law is a blade that cuts both ways
the law is a light that can blind on bright days
I followed the law to escape my sin
but the law without conscience is just the stone again

tracks.title: The Stones Unhallowed
tracks.prompt: atmospheric industrial, haunted male vocals, shamanic percussion, stone-scraping textures, Dead Can Dance meets Einsturzende Neubauten, Ab minor, 68 BPM, Shinovar homecoming, ancient and desolate
tracks.lyrics:
[verse 1]
Shinovar has no storms, the mountains hold the wind at bay
the grass grows long and soft, the animals do not decay
into crem and stone, this land is green, impossibly alive
and the stone shamans sit at the center and decide who will survive

I return now as something they cannot name or hold
I walked in stone, I stepped on rock, crimes the shamans told
were unforgivable, unclean, the very earth defiled
but I have walked in war and I have killed and I have died

[chorus]
the stones are not hallowed, the shamans were wrong
the stones are just stones and the song is just a song
they took the Honorblades and hid them in their shrine
and called the one who noticed truthless, they called the truth a crime

[verse 2]
nine Honorblades locked in a vault, the Heralds' own weapons of power
and the shamans who guarded them grew drunk on their tower
of authority, of silence, of control through sacred fear
and any voice that questioned was the voice they disappeared

I was their best weapon, a truthless they could sell
a Surgebinder with no choice, a man living in hell
and all along the real criminals wore the robes and spoke the prayers
and sent the honest ones to die in other nations' affairs

[bridge]
I will cleanse my homeland, not with hate but with the truth
I will open every vault and show the people proof
that the shamans used the sacred as a shield for their corruption
and the truthless was the only honest man in the eruption

[chorus]
the stones are not hallowed, the shamans were wrong
the stones are just stones and the song is just a song
they took the Honorblades and hid them in their shrine
and called the one who noticed truthless, they called the truth a crime

tracks.title: Szeth's Peace
tracks.prompt: resolving ambient industrial, haunted male vocals softening, clean synths emerging, distant wind, Sigur Ros meets Depeche Mode, F major, 72 BPM, hard-won stillness, assassin at rest
tracks.lyrics:
[verse 1]
I have died twice and returned each time to the same blood-stained sky
Nale revived me with a fabrial, the Herald would not let me die
because a weapon this effective is too valuable to waste
and I accepted it because I did not trust my own taste

for death, for peace, for the silence that the dead are owed
I carried every face behind my eyes down every road
and the weight of them should have crushed me, should have ground me into dust
but something in the Shin survives, call it stubbornness or trust

[chorus]
peace is not the absence of the killing
peace is the presence of the choice
I chose to serve the law, I chose to cleanse the lie
and for the first time in my life I chose my own voice

[verse 2]
Nightblood rests beside me, quiet for the moment, sated
and the ghosts still follow, patient, accumulated, weighted
but I do not argue with them anymore, I do not plead
I sit with them in silence and I let the silence lead

Kaladin offered me something I did not expect
not forgiveness, not absolution, just a kind of respect
one soldier to another, one weapon put to rest
the acknowledgment that the truthless did the truthless's best

[bridge]
I am Szeth-son-son-Vallano, Truthless of Shinovar
I am the Assassin in White, the High Judge, the scar
but underneath the titles I am just a man from the green land
who spoke the truth too early and paid more than he had planned

[chorus]
peace is not the absence of the killing
peace is the presence of the choice
I chose to serve the law, I chose to cleanse the lie
and for the first time in my life I chose my own voice

[outro]
the wind does not blow in Shinovar
the grass is soft beneath bare feet
and somewhere in the quiet
a man in white sits down
and does not reach for the sword
